properties.title: ICTC Building
properties.about: ICTC supports campus information technology services, networking, and digital infrastructure used for academic, administrative, and laboratory computing needs.

properties.title: Campus Mess
properties.about: Campus Mess provides affordable daily meals and basic dining services for students, staff, and residents within the Pulchowk premises.

properties.title: Dean Office
properties.about: The Dean Office is the central administrative office of IOE, overseeing academic policy, coordination, and institute-level governance functions.

properties.title: Department of Architecture
properties.about: This department runs architecture and planning programs, with design studios and coursework that blend technical, social, and environmental perspectives.

properties.title: ASA Office

properties.title: MSC Hostel

properties.title: Hydro Lab

properties.title: Department of Roads
properties.about: This office represents Nepal?s Department of Roads unit near campus, associated with transport infrastructure coordination and technical engagement.

properties.title: Locus Office
properties.about: Locus Office supports the student-led LOCUS technology festival team for planning events, projects, competitions, and coordination activities.

properties.title: Department of Electrical, Electronics and Computer Engineering
properties.about: This department delivers electronics, communication, and computer engineering education with laboratories, projects, and research-driven undergraduate and graduate learning.

properties.title: Robotics Club
properties.about: Robotics Club is a student innovation space known for robotics projects and ABU Robocon participation, with open collaborative technical activities.

properties.about: The Continuing Education Center hosts training, professional development, and short technical programs for students, graduates, and working professionals.

properties.title: Pulchowk Library
properties.about: Pulchowk Library maintains a large engineering collection and study spaces, supporting coursework, thesis work, reference access, and research activities.

properties.title: Electrical Club

properties.title: Block C

properties.title: Embark College

properties.about: The Civil Engineering department is a major and long-established unit offering undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in core civil fields.

properties.title: F Block

properties.title: Department of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering
